attributes.action: stop students calling male teachers sir when they dont have a knighthood
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many male teachers are often called sir by their pupils. Correct me if im wrong but this is a term given to those who have recieved a knighthood. I think that by calling them sir it is showing lack of respect for those who have actually earned the right to have this title. Many teachers insist on being called this, pupils should be able to articulate their feelings by calling teachers what they want. Their should be rules against incorrectly using the term "sir".

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
